name: Oatmeal & the Elemental Trio
description:
Oatmeal's friends have been kidnapped by the Evil King of Elements, so you must go and save them. The Evil King of Elements used Oatmeal's friend's elemental disadvantages to put them behind bars and use their elemental powers for himself. Fire has been captured by the water enemies in the water stage, Water has been captured by the electric enemies in the electric stage, and Electric has been captured by the fire enemies in the fire stage.  Complete each stage's objective to destroy the jail bars and rescue your friends. Go save your friends in any order you want or maybe go straight to the boss without any help to really prove your skill.

Instructions:

Use the arrow keys to move or WASD. Hold down space to shoot. Use the Z key to rotate to the left, and the X key to rotate to the right. The elemental advantages are: water beats fire, electric beats water, and fire beats electric. Also There are no elemental disadvantages.

This was made for the Brackey's Game Jam 2021.1 with the theme "Stronger Together."
